text.p: True or False: If [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] is finite-dimensional, and [mathjaxinline]W[/mathjaxinline] is a subspace of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline], then every basis of [mathjaxinline]W[/mathjaxinline] is contained in some basis of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline].

font.p: True. Any basis of [mathjaxinline]W[/mathjaxinline] is linearly independent, and we showed that any linearly independent set in a finite-dimensional space [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] can be extended to basis of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline].
